entry.title: PARADISE LOST: WHEN BIG YOGI LEFT CELTIC: Part Two
entry.summary: CELTIC legend John ‘Yogi’ Hughes played his last game for the club 53 years ago. The club’s eighth-highest goalscorer with 189 strikes had his last hurrah at Parkhead when he played in the 3-0 European Cup victory over BK 1903 Copenhagen to help the team through to the next round on a 4-2 aggregate scoreline.
